snippet: Developers are proceeding with plans for My Image Studios, a “living room” of black and Latino-flavored arts and culture in Harlem.
abstract: My Image Studios, an ambitious for-profit cultural center opening this summer in Harlem, aims to be a 'living room' of black and Latino arts and culture; plans include a restaurant and bar, three theaters and post-production studios.
lead_paragraph: Developers are proceeding with plans for My Image Studios, a “living room” of black and Latino-flavored arts and culture in Harlem.

headline.seo: High Ambitions for My Image Studios in Harlem
headline.main: High Ambitions for a Commercial Arts Center in Harlem
headline.print_headline: High Ambitions for a Commercial Arts Center in Harlem
